entity.name: Narendra Modi
entity.description: Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi

text:
@narendramodi Dear Prime minister Ji, This is a great initiative for poor. Thank you very much! 
But, what about tax payers? We are not getting any benefits. When the middle man should expect some relief ? Also, request you to  spend more money on testing COVID19. Thank you! Jai Hind 🙏.
